Aiming for Simple - we listened to the feedback from the #IOTAcommunity & our partners to simplify our product names. We're thrilled to introduce the first new names: #IOTAStreams, #IOTAAccess and #IOTASmartContracts. Read about it at  https://t.co/SBGD33s5JT #IOTA

Join us for the first #VirtualReality MeetUp (in English) organized by @iotashop with presentations from Dominik Schiener - our cofounder, Antonio Nardella - our Community Manager, @CovidTrack & more. April 6 at 7 PM CET. Register at  https://t.co/Tmma8d3KcA #IOTA #StayHome

Today at 5pm GMT-3, we will have Evaldas Drasutis from IOTA Foundation presenting his work on #IOTA Smart Contracts in our @IotaArgentina virtual Meetup. Join us via zoom to find out more about this key feature for IOTA! #IOTAStrong #IOTALatam  https://t.co/Ix7um7LcF0  https://t.co/DSM6Bwpdqa

One of our core products, MAM, is now called #IOTA Streams and is officially in alpha 🔥

Whoever in the future will be able to recall the original name will certainly be in a position to radiate a sense of long-lasting intimacy with the project - like "You know, I started with #IOTA at a time when #IOTAStreams still has been called #MAM ...".

Happy to announce the release of our #Espiota website. Check it out to see the prototype in action. Developed together with @iotashop. Follow @espiota for upcoming news!   https://t.co/h6zlYdGZM6  #IOTA #Crypto #Prototype #ESP32  https://t.co/XWe6wuorJR

IOTA Streams is a multi-functional secure protocol that can be used for different types of data transmission on the #IOTA Tangle (e.g.: streaming encrypted sensor data).  Written in #rustlang, soon in C as well. Amazing work by Vlad Semenov!   https://t.co/U24NbpJQ6b
